Name: Please Teach Me Onedari Shogi
About the game: Let’s teach Shogi to the Onedari Girls and get to know them better! This title is based on the traditional Japanese game of Shogi. In Shogi, players take turns moving pieces with unique moves, and the winner is the one who captures the opponent's 'Ousho'. Play against the three 'begging girls' and sometimes listen to their requests as you progress in the game. If you increase the girls' favorability, good things may happen to you. Onedari Girls are Shogi novices. When they face a difficult situation, they request a “Do-Over” or “Hint.” Accept their requests to get along with the girls! When you get to know them better, you will receive special treat... Equipped with a function that helps you feel like you can teach the girls Shogi even if you are a beginner! For those who want to get along better with the girls, there is a DLC for each girl.
Developers: 株式会社シルバースタージャパン,mebius.
